name: The Running Fan
description:
The power went out in the building... He don't need to worry... That late, he's alone, after all...

But not for long apparently...

Fortunately he will fix that while we're all sleeping !

The Running Fan is a randomly generated horror game where you're playing as a security guard who needs to turn the power back on as it suddently shut down... You thought you were alone...

Turn on all the levers across the building and restore the electricity without getting flagged by the boys. They thought of tinkering with the furniture to make it move... And to move theirself faster. And hide inside !

WASD/ZQSD : Movement

F : Change the glowstick

LShift : Run

LMB : Interact

Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2
